HTTPHeadersWant-Digest.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The Want-Digest HTTP header is primarily used in a request, to ask the server to provide a digest of the requested resource using the {{HTTPHeader("Digest")}} response header.

remarks.para:
The header contains identifiers for one or more digest algorithms that the sender wishes the server to use to create the digest.
The request may use quality values to indicate its preference/order for particular digest algorithms.
If Want-Digest does not include any digest algorithms that the server supports, the server may respond with:
See the page for the Digest header for more information.
